column4: quick question: I got a windows pc which doesn't start windows7, but I want to acces some really important documents.
can I just use the live cd, get the document and put on usb to load on a windows machine?
How is that even remotely related to Ubuntu? You can use the livecd allright
yeah I know, but my GF doesn't know much about pc and is on the otherside of the world
